subject: Baseball
Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Brian McNamee, Roger Clemens’s former trainer, testified Monday that he helped Andy Pettitte, Chuck Knoblauch and Mike Stanton acquire performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Brian McNamee, Roger Clemens’s former trainer, testified Monday that he helped Andy Pettitte, Chuck Knoblauch and Mike Stanton acquire performance-enhancing drugs.
